name: Alternatives To Fighting
Lore: 'The Rebellion''s limited resources force it to consider the wisdom of any military encounter. In many cases, retreat or deception is a preferable recourse.',
Text: 'Use 3 Force to cancel a battle just initiated at a system or sector. OR Cancel Besieged. OR Release (move for free) all your characters from a captured starship to your side of any docking bay site.',
